EmailTemplate.name: 12-08-20 DBNK SMB Campaign Email 5.Subject Line Test
EmailTemplate.subject: If not now, When?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Wintrust Selects NCR Digital First Banking Platform
Wintrust Financial Corporation selects the NCR Digital First Banking Platform, including the NCR D3 and CSP solutions to power its digital transformation across their 15 bank brands and 180 locations. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> Better understand and serve your business clients with up-to-the minute insights, news and more
When it comes to serving businesses of any size, financial institutions must understand market trends, business challengesâ€”and, ultimately, how to provide best-in-class digital banking that keeps your brand on top. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]>
